name: Cavan County Council
description: We will lead and promote the economic, social and cultural development of our County, build confidence in our future, improve quality of life for our citizens and promote a more sustainable and inclusive society. In delivering our services, we will ensure best possible value for money and will be accountable for our actions.

name: Cavan Arts
description: Cavan County Council Arts Office is funded by the Arts Council and Cavan County Council.
